scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/core build && bun run --cwd packages/ai-sdk build
scripts.dev: bun run build && concurrently -n core,ai-sdk,example -c blue,magenta,green "bun run --cwd packages/core dev" "bun run --cwd packages/ai-sdk dev" "bun run --cwd examples/express-app dev"
scripts.clean: bun run --cwd packages/core clean && bun run --cwd packages/ai-sdk clean
scripts.typecheck: bun run --cwd packages/core typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/ai-sdk typecheck
